code: import{useQuery}from'react-query';import{getFilteredPosts}from'@/apis/post/getFilteredPosts';const getQueryKey=postId=>["post/filtered-teahouse/post/".concat(postId)];export default function useFilteredPosts(postId){return useQuery(getQueryKey(postId),async()=>{const filteredPosts=await getFilteredPosts(postId);return filteredPosts;});}
